short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A personal dashboard for you and your distributed team.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep the Team Informed.
* Add important announcements and keep everyone focused on the most important things.

Simple, Lightweight, Easy to Use.
* A beautiful shared page for your distributed team - with inspiring backgrounds, timezones, and important announcements on every new tab.

No Login Required.
* Securely share your home page with the entire team using your unique URL.

- Keep the team on track
- Overcome timezone challenges
- Asynchronous communication made easy
